text: The canton of Lens is an administrative division of the Pas-de-Calais department, in northern France. It was created at the French canton reorganisation which came into effect in March 2015. Its seat is in Lens.Décret n° 2014-233 du 24 février 2014 portant délimitation des cantons dans le département du Pas-de-Calais It consists of the following communes: #Annay #Lens #Loison-sous-Lens ==References== Category:Cantons of Pas-de- Calais
title: Canton of Lens
